data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chami-Kranon, Thanaphum, Likhitrakarn, Natdanai, Dankittipakul, Pakawin (2007): Allagelena monticola sp. n. (Araneae: Agelenidae), a new species of funnel­web spiders from northern Thailand. Zootaxa 1397: 47-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175358
